famousquotes.quote: 'It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent.'
famousquotes.author: Madeleine Albright

famousquotes.quote: 'Of course I am not worried about intimidating men. The type of man who will be intimidated by me is exactly the type of man I have no interest in.'
famousquotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

famousquotes.quote: 'Feminism isn't about making women strong. Women are already strong. It's about changing the way the world perceives that strength.'
famousquotes.author: G.D. Anderson

famousquotes.quote: 'No country can ever truly flourish if it stifles the potential of its women and deprives itself of the contributions of half its citizens.'
famousquotes.author: Michelle Obama

famousquotes.quote: 'The best protection any woman can haveâ€¦ is courage.'
famousquotes.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

famousquotes.quote: 'If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman.'
famousquotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

famousquotes.quote: 'The emerging woman ... will be strong-minded, strong-hearted, strong-souled, and strong-bodied...strength and beauty must go together.'
famousquotes.author: Louisa May Alcott
